alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:33PM MDT until July 07 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... North central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... Southeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 331 PM MDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located near Chugwater, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and large accumulations of small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Accumulation of hail could make for hazardous travel conditions. * Locations impacted include... Chugwater and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 39 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
